description: Supports the programming of a Micro:bit with MicroPython for controlling a Maqueen robot.
properties.advancedControl: Display additional commands for the control unit.
properties.logErrors: Outputs error messages in the terminal.
viewsWelcome.welcome1:
The open folder does not contain a (complete) Micro:bit project. Create a Micro:bit project in the open folder or select a different folder. 
[Create Micro:bit project](command:maqueen.createProject)
[Open another folder](command:maqueen.openWorkspace)
viewsWelcome.welcome2:
Open a folder to continue an existing Micro:bit project or create a new one.
[open folder](command:maqueen.openWorkspace)
command.refreshExtLibFileToWorkspace: Renews external module in the project
